attributes.action: Stop giving money to other countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government are constantly giving away large sums of money to other countries whilst saying there isn't enough funding for services in this country.  The government should be made to consult the general public before giving money away.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
